result.purpose: Contains styles and type definitions for a web application built with Vite and Tailwind CSS.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture, separating styles and type definitions to maintain clarity and reusability.

src/App.css.purpose: Styling for a web application, including layout, animations, and theme management.
side_effects: Custom scrollbar styles for different browsers

src/index.css.purpose: Styling for a web application using Tailwind CSS and custom styles.
side_effects: Applies styles based on color scheme preference

src/vite-env.d.ts.purpose: This file provides type definitions for Vite client.
